original_title:
A Muslim migrant told a German police officer that he shouldn’t have a German Shepherd because dogs are ‘disgusting’ and ‘haram’.

The dog didn’t like it and scared the shit out of him.

“Get this dirty mutt away from me.”

🤣  — The Donald
article_summary: Muslim migrant expresses dislike for German Shepherds, sparking debate about the role and value of dogs in human society, with some commenters suggesting a correlation between dog behavior and Muslims.</s>
